scripts.start-local: npm run sass2; LOGGER=false ENV=LOCAL node website-zeus.js
scripts.start-live: git reset --hard; git pull; npm i; npm run sass2; LOGGER=true ENV=LIVE forever restart website-zeus.js
scripts.start-live-test: npm run sass2; LOGGER=false ENV=LIVE node website-zeus.js
scripts.start-develop: git reset --hard; git pull; npm i; npm run sass2; pm2 restart zeusDevelop
scripts.start-develop-test: npm i; npm run sass2; pm2 restart zeusDevelop
